verbs.description: [ARG0: Friedrich Trump] [V: built] [ARG1: the Arctic Restaurant and Hotel in Bennett , Canada] , and kickstarted the family 's multi- billion empire . The brothel housed prostitutes and sold large amount of alcohol .
